name: gawk
content:

Add to word list
to look at something or someone in a stupid or rude way: Don't sit there gawking like that - give me a hand!gawk at They just stood there gawking at me. Synonym
gapeCompare
goggle informal

to look at something or someone in a foolish way without thinking: Don’t stand there gawking at her, give her a hand!
